posts.post_title: wtb: Joe Kelley SGC 4 Piedmont T206
posts.post_content: Title says it all .. looking for the joe kelley t206 SGC 4 maybe a little higher... had a  offer on one for 80$ a few months back..card has since sold... looking to see if I can find something similar!
